name: Wrath of the Rat King
description:
Made for the Adelaide Game Developers Slam Jam 2 

Wrath of the Rat King is a horror survival strategy game where you must expand the rat civilization across the galaxy, all while working to appease your Rat King overlord in his eternal hunger. Harvest resources, grow your population, and explore the galaxy. 

WASD and mouse wheel for camera control, mouse click for other actions. ESC or P to pause.
